definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 19:36 hin, a liquid measure (LXX ei)/n (I)/n; LXXL I)/n); but xou=v Le 19:36; Gk. i)/uion, Egypt. measure, = sextarius, acc. t o Böckh:Metrol. Unters. 244 cf. Brandis:Münz- Mass- & Gewichtswesen 29, 30; the Heb. hin (6.06 litres) was, however, much larger than the Egypt. hin (0.456 litre), v. Hultsch:Metrol., Tab. xxi. p. 714, & pp. 368, 450 ff.; v. further Ri:HWB Smith:Dict.Bib. E. Meyer:Gesch. i. 228)—abs. [[הִין]] Ex 30:24 + 4 t. Ez Eze 45, Eze 46; [[הַהִין]] Ex 29:40, Ex 29:40 + 14 t.; cstr. [[הִין]] Le 19:36; —
a measure, used of quantity of water for drinking Ez Eze 4:11; usually in connexion with offerings:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of oil used with meal-offering Ex 29:40, Nu 15:4, Nu 15:6, Nu 15:9, Nu 28:5 (all P), Ez Eze 45:24, Eze 46:5, Eze 46:6, Eze 46:11, Eze 46:14; —usually 1/4 hin to 1/10 ephah (of meal-offering); Nu 15:6 1/3; v:Nu 15:9 1/2; in Ez a (whole) hin, exc. Eze 46:14 1/3 hin to 1/6. ephah.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: used in mixing the anointing oil Ex 30:24.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of wine as drink-offering Le 23:13 (H); elsewh. P, Ex 29:40, Nu 15:5, Nu 28:14 (all 1/4 hin) Nu 15:7, Nu 28:14 (both 1/3 hin), Nu 15:10, Nu 28:14 (both 1/2 hin; all with 1/10 to 3/10 ephah in case of meal-offering).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: once of [[שֵׁכָר]] as drink-offering Nu 28:7 (P; 1/4 hin; cf. Di).

vessel with capacity of hin Le 19:36 (H) [[הִין־חֶדֶק]] a just hin (‖´[[מאׁזְנֵי ח]], ´[[אַבְנֵי־ח]], ´[[אֵיפַת ח]]).—The hin = 1/6 bath acc. to Joseph.:Ant. iii. 8, 3; 9, 4, = 6.06 litres (Hultsch:l.c.), v. II. [[בַּת]]. On order of words in above passages, note that [[הִין]] (´[[רְבִיעִת ה]] etc.) is usually appos. of liquid measured, & either precedes it Ex 29:40, Nu 15:4, Nu 28:14, or, more oft., follows it Ex 30:24 + 10 t.; Nu 28:7 they are in diff. clauses; in Ex 29:40 we find [[רֶבַע הַהִין]]…[[בְּשֶׁמֶן]], cf. Nu 15:6, Nu 15:9, Nu 28:5; —Nu 28:14 is peculiar: [[וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם חֲחִי הַהִין יִהְיֶה לַפָּר וּשְׁלִישִׁת]] [[הַהִין לָאַיִל וּרְבִיעִת הַהִין לַכֶּבֶשׂ יׇ֑יִן]] ([[יין]] only at end).
